title: Poster :: Hindu trad-wives on Indian Social Media
heading: Hindu trad-wives on Indian Social Media
blurbs: This is a companion website of my poster titled: Indian social media influencers are using Hindu trad-wife performatives and misogynist humour to sell products online.
This poster research was supervised by Dr Caitlin Petre from School of Comunication and Information, Rutgers University.
Here all the Instagram posts which I have referenced in my research are listed along with a brief commentary from me.
